00047 #ifndef MT_POINT_H
00048 #define MT_POINT_H
00049 
00050 #include "MT_Vector3.h"
00051 
00052 class MT_Point3 : public MT_Vector3 {
00053 public:
00054     MT_Point3() {}
00055     MT_Point3(const float *v) : MT_Vector3(v) {} 
00056     MT_Point3(const double *v) : MT_Vector3(v) {}
00057     MT_Point3(MT_Scalar xx, MT_Scalar yy, MT_Scalar zz) : MT_Vector3(xx, yy, zz) {}
00058 
00059     MT_Point3& operator+=(const MT_Vector3& v);
00060     MT_Point3& operator-=(const MT_Vector3& v);
00061     MT_Point3& operator=(const MT_Vector3& v);
00062     MT_Point3& operator=(const MT_Point3& v);
00063 
00064     MT_Scalar  distance(const MT_Point3& p) const;
00065     MT_Scalar  distance2(const MT_Point3& p) const;
00066 
00067     MT_Point3  lerp(const MT_Point3& p, MT_Scalar t) const;
00068 };
00069 
00070 MT_Point3  operator+(const MT_Point3& p, const MT_Vector3& v);
00071 MT_Point3  operator-(const MT_Point3& p, const MT_Vector3& v);
00072 MT_Vector3 operator-(const MT_Point3& p1, const MT_Point3& p2);
00073

00075 MT_Scalar MT_distance2(const MT_Point3& p1, const MT_Point3& p2);
